header.title: Preparing the Netherlands for Superintelligence
header.subtitle: A Delta Plan for the AI Transition

intro.section3: The Netherlands' position: from leader to laggard

delta_plan.title: A new Delta Plan for AI
delta_plan.description1: In the twentieth century, the Netherlands built the Delta Works to protect our country from water. Not a luxury project, but an act of self-protection â€“ visionary, collective, and indispensable. Today we face another existential threat. Not from water, but from digital dependency. AI is becoming the foundation of the economy, defense, healthcare, education, and everything that keeps our society running. If we don't build and understand these systems ourselves, we lose control over our future.
delta_plan.description2: To address this challenge, we present an initial approach for a national AI Delta Plan, intended to fuel discussion and drive action:
